metadata.description: Building the best file manager for Windows.

community.title: Designed and developed by you.
community.description: Files is free and open source software, maintained and designed by a collective of hundreds of contributors.
community.contributions: {amount, plural, =0 {No contributions} one {# contribution} other {# contributions}}

design.title: Power meets beauty.
design.description: Explore a beautiful Windows-first design. Manage all your files with increased productivity. Work across multiple folders with tabs. And so much more.

features.title: It already does that.
features.description: Cloud files integration? Tabs and multiple layouts? Rich file previews? Files has it covered with robust features you expect from a modern file manager.

cloud.title: Seamless cloud integration
cloud.description: Integration with cloud services such as OneDrive, Google Drive, and iCloud allow you to manage your documents and photos in the cloud, right from the sidebar.

preview.title: File preview
preview.description: Preview documents, photos, and more without opening them. Support for rich previews, syntax highlighting, markdown and video playback is all built in.

tags.title: Tagged Files & Folders
tags.description: Quickly mark and organize your files and folders for later by assigning them colored and named tags for easy identification. You can even add your own custom tags!

tabs.title: Multitask with tabs
tabs.description: Avoid multiple windows and keep your desktop clutter-free. Files features a browser-like tabbing interface complete with keyboard shortcuts.

themes.title: Distictly personal.
themes.description: Have it your way. Files features a fully customizable user interface, right down to the colors and materials. Try custom themes that are built into Files or dive right into the docs and create your own.
